\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Generates and writes a binary torus density map based on input parameters.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Parameters}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{tor\_R}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \textendash{} Major radius of the torus.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{tor\_r}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \textendash{} Minor radius of the torus.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{tor\_th}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}) \textendash{} Thickness of the bilipid layer.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{extension}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} Additional extension factor (default is 0.0).

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{boundingbox\_length}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} Length of the bounding box for Torus centered at (0,0,0). Default value 2240 Å.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{voxel\_size}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} Individual voxel size in the output map file. Default value 10 Å.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{outmap\_fname}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{optional}}) \textendash{} Output map file name of the torus. Default is “torus\_yeast\_fitted.mrc” in the current directory.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Returns}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Torus object based on input parameters.

\sphinxlineitem{Return type}
\sphinxAtStartPar
{\hyperref[\detokenize{src:src.Torus.Torus}]{\sphinxcrossref{Torus}}}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
